item.title: hugo note
item.description: hugoでプロジェクトを作成 $ hugo new site <プロジェクト名> Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in PATH/hugo/test. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the same-named folder. Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/ or create your own with the "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" command. 2. Perhaps you want to add some content. You can add single files with "hugo new <SECTIONNAME>/<FILENAME>.<FORMAT>". 3. Start the built-in live server via "hugo server".
